items.sentence: Tom told me that he thought Mary was beautiful.
Tom told me that his father was a teacher, too.
Tom told us where he spent his spring vacation.
Tom has the experience necessary to do the job.
Tom has three fingers missing on his left hand.
Tom looks as happy as any person could ever be.
Tom offered what he thought was helpful advice.
I heard that both Tom and Mary have been fired.
I hope next time will be better than last time.
I just thought of something else I have to buy.
